name: Hand of Fate 2
description: A new hero rises to challenge the Dealer in Hand of Fate 2! Master a living boardgame of infinitely replayable quests - unlock new cards, build your adventure, then defeat your foes in brutal real-time combat! Draw your cards, play your hand and discover your fate!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/7/8/8.1/Vista (32 or 64 bit) Processor: 2.4ghz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600, NVIDIA GeForce GT 630, Radeon HD 5670 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10/7/8/8.1/Vista (32 or 64 bit) Processor: 2.66GHz Intel Core i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5200, NVIDIA GeForce GT 750, Radeon HD 7800 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
